tecnicDescription.title: Technical Description
tecnicDescription.description: Web application for task management inspired by Microsoft To Do. The frontend was developed using React and TypeScript, with TaskTack Query for data management, Auth0 for authentication, and Material UI (MUI) for the interface. The backend was built with .NET Web API, implementing design patterns such as Repository Pattern, Unit of Work, and CQRS with MediatR and Entity Framework. The database used is PostgreSQL. The backend and database are hosted on Railway, while the frontend is deployed on Vercel.
itemsDescription: Frontend: React, TypeScript, TaskTack Query, Auth0, Material UI (MUI)
Backend: .NET Web API, Repository Pattern, Unit of Work Pattern, CQRS, MediatR, Entity Framework

useDescription.title: Application Description
useDescription.description: Each user can create and manage multiple personalized task lists, allowing them to add, edit, and delete both lists and the tasks within them. Each task includes attributes such as title, importance, completion status, notes, and a due date. In addition to custom lists, the application provides default lists for better organization and quick access:
itemsDescription: My Day: Tasks added here remain for 24 hours.
Important: Groups tasks marked as important.
Planned: Contains tasks with a set due date.
All Tasks: Shows all tasks, regardless of their status or list.
